description: The underlying cause of the identified issues in Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager stems from newly discovered vulnerabilities, which were highlighted through the company's commitment to cybersecurity. Veeam has run thorough internal testing as part of its vulnerability disclosure programs, leading to the identification of potential vulnerabilities affecting the backup solution. These vulnerabilities necessitated a prompt response, resulting in the release of a fix. Customers are encouraged to download and deploy this fix to maintain security integrity. The associated Knowledge Base article (KB4581) provides further details on the issues, emphasizing the importance of utilizing the most recent product version as a best practice to mitigate risks.
